title: Ticket #1517: Unify "do I use sandboxing/file transfer" logic in schedd and shadow
description:
The shadow and the schedd have similar, but not identical, logic for determining if file transfer and sandboxing are necessary. We use file transfer and sandboxing if ATTR_WANT_IO_PROXY || !ATTR_NEVER_CREATE_JOB_SANDBOX. We might use sandboxing anyway (but not filetransfer?) depending on the universe. This is fragile. It should be unified.

The relevant code is in

/src/condor_schedd.V6/schedd.cpp line 2100 jobIsSandboxed

/src/condor_shadow.V6.1/pseudo_ops.cpp line 104 pseudo_get_job_info
